```{r load_package, message = FALSE}
library(psych)
library(car)
library(carData)
```


```{r load data}
data(Tal.Or)
media <- Tal.Or
head(media)
```


```{r model1}
media.lm1 <- lm(reaction ~ pmi, media)
car::scatterplot(reaction ~ pmi, media) # pmi seems negatively skewed
hist(media$pmi)
qqPlot(media$pmi) # not normal. Should it be transform?
influenceIndexPlot(media.lm1) # only a few data point with high h values
summary(media.lm1)

media.lm2 <- lm(reaction ~ pmi + import, media)
plot(media.lm2)
summary(media.lm2)
anova(media.lm1, media.lm2)

media.lm3 <- lm(reaction ~ pmi + import + age, media)
summary(media.lm3)
anova(media.lm1, media.lm2, media.lm3) # no incremental R-squared for age

# conclude with model 2
```
